titleOrderSuccess: Plum has received your order. So what’s next?
textOrderSuccess: Check {{email}} for the order confirmation letter. Once the order is ready, we will send you a tracking number. If you want to be in the know about all our new drops, why not give us a follow on Instagram?
textFailedOrder: Something went wrong. Please try again or contact us at help@pluplum.co
